parameter.name: ttl
parameter.description: Specifies how long breakglass mode should remain active once triggered. The value may include a suffix to indicate the unit of time: .B m for minutes, .B h for hours, or .B d for days. If no suffix is provided, the value is interpreted as seconds. After the specified period, offline breakglass mode automatically expires and normal authentication resumes.
parameter.example: [offline_breakglass] .br enabled = true .br ttl = 1d .br # Permit offline MFA logins for up to 24 hours after activation
